column1: #FORMAT=WebAnno TSV 3.2
#T_SP=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.ner.type.NamedEntity|identifier|value
#T_CH=de.tudarmstadt.ukp.dkpro.core.api.coref.type.CoreferenceLink|referenceRelation|referenceType
#Text=Katara says : " Aang , what are you doing ?!
#Text=Now I understand .
#Text=You 're upset and angry because your home was burned down .
#Text=When I saw the forest had burned , I was sad and upset , but my friend gave me hope that the forest would grow back .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka !
#Text=" Sokka says : " What happened ?
#Text=" Katara says : " You were trapped in the Spirit World for 24 hours !
#Text=How are you feeling ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " Like I seriously need to use the bathroom .
#Text=" Senlin Village leader says : " Thank you , Avatar .
#Text=If only there were a way to repay you for what you 've done .
#Text=" Sokka says : " You could give us some supplies , and some money .
#Text=" Katara says : " Sokka !
#Text=" Sokka says : " What ?
#Text=We need stuff .
#Text=" Senlin Village leader says : " It would be an honor to help you prepare for your journey .
#Text=" Katara says : " I 'm so proud of you , Aang .
#Text=You figured out what to do , all on your own .
#Text=" Aang says : " Actually , I did have a little help and there 's something else .
#Text=" Sokka says : " What is it ?
#Text=" Aang says : " I need to talk to Roku and I think I found a way to contact his spirit .
#Text=" Katara says : " That 's great !
#Text=" Sokka says : " Creepy , but great .
#Text=" Aang says : " There 's a temple on a crescent - shaped island and if I go there on the solstice , I 'll be able to speak with him .
#Text=" Katara says : " But the solstice is tomorrow !
#Text=" Aang says : " Yeah , and there 's one more problem .
#Text=The island is in the Fire Nation .
#Text=" Main Aang Appa Katara Hei Bai Iroh Kay - fon Momo Senlin Village leader Sokka Zuko says : " Minor Earthbender captain Fang " Aang says : " I ca n't believe it .
#Text=I know the War has spread far , but Omashu always seemed ... untouchable .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Up until now it was .
#Text=Now Ba Sing Se is the only great Earth Kingdom stronghold left .
#Text=" Katara says : " This is horrible , but we have to move on .
#Text=" Aang says : " No , I 'm going in to find Bumi .
#Text=" Sokka says : " Aang , stop .
#Text=We do n't even know if Bumi 's still ... " Aang says : " What ?
#Text=If he 's still what ?
#Text=" Sokka says : " A-around .
#Text=" Katara says : " I know you had your heart set on Bumi , but there are other people who can teach you earthbending .
#Text=" Aang says : " This is n't about finding a teacher .
#Text=This is about finding my friend .
#Text="
